title: Segregation of d.c. and a.c. systems and systems of different voltages
fullText:
Vessels equipped with d.c. and a.c. electrical systems and systems of different voltages shall have the distribution from the different systems from either separate distribution boards, or from a common distribution board with a partition to separate the sections of different systems from each other.
Cables for a.c. and d.c. or different voltage systems shall be separated by double insulation (sheathing) of cables for each different system.
